content.p: Associate Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Tze Peng is currently Associate Professor in Special and Inclusive Education. Originally trained as a speech-language therapist, she is passionate about supporting children with special educational needs in the classroom and family-centred interventions, through evidence-based intervention strategies. Her research interests are: ORCID ID: https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6593-2309 Qualifications: Recent Awards: Postgraduate Undergraduate In the past, I had convened these modules More information about my research interest: https://www.nottingham.edu.my/Research/Inspiring-people/Wong-Tze-Peng.aspx telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
